mapper.insert: insert into fa_DeptScale( sCardNum, lOptID, sDeptNum, dblScale, sDeprSubjectNum, sDeprSubjectName, sProjectNum, sProjectName, cItemclsId )values ( #{sCardNum}, #{lOptID}, #{sDeptNum}, #{dblScale}, #{sDeprSubjectNum}, #{sDeprSubjectName}, #{sProjectNum}, #{sProjectName}, #{cItemclsId} )
